Body:
setRoles(self.portal, TEST_USER_ID, ['Contributor'])
obj = api.content.create(container=self.parent, type='Newsletter Issue', id
    ='newsletter_issue')
self.assertTrue(INewsletterIssue.providedBy(obj),
    u'INewsletterIssue not provided by {0}!'.format(obj.id))
self.assertIn('newsletter_issue', self.parent.objectIds())
api.content.delete(obj=obj)
self.assertNotIn('newsletter_issue', self.parent.objectIds())
